General.Name: Qiaoyin Environmental Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Qiaoyin City Management Co., Ltd. engages in the environmental protection and sanitation management business in China. The company's activities comprise soil remediation, sewage treatment, air cleaning, sludge, hazardous waste treatment, etc. It is also involved in the cleaning, collection, transportation, and treatment of domestic waste activities; and urban and rural sanitation cleaning, domestic waste disposal, municipal sanitation engineering, and other environmental sanitation activities. The company was formerly known as QiaoYin Environmental Tech.Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Qiaoyin City Management Co., Ltd. in December 2020. Qiaoyin City Management Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
